author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Luxury Jeddah hotel offers special packages for corporate travellersTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Luxury Jeddah hotel offers special packages for corporate travellers  
Business travellers staying at Rosewood Jeddah can enjoy special rates with the Business Bundle package designed to help executives conduct their work with as much ease as possible.
The Business Bundle promotion at Rosewood Jeddah has been designed with the busy corporate traveller in mind. The award-winning hotel has created this exclusive deal to provide luxury accommodation with a range of added benefits to help guests work away from home. The Business Bundle package is valid for stays from Saturday to Wednesday.
Before they even reach the hotel, guests are provided with chauffeur-driven limousines from the airport that welcome them with cold towels and refreshments as well as free Wi-Fi service. For the short journey to the hotel, limousines are equipped with the latest international newspapers and a wide selection of music.
Guests will then be offered a complimentary pressing of one set of garments upon arrival, ready to be worn for the next business day. With high speed internet access, 24-hour butler service with tea and coffee served throughout the day to the room and a savoury buffet breakfast at renowned international restaurant Habsburg.
The hotel also offers a choice of five boardrooms featuring the latest technology and a dedicated Butler to assist with administrative support, food and beverage service. The boardrooms are the ideal location to host meetings for associates and offer inspiring views of the Red Sea.
Guests wishing to impress their clients or simply looking for a delicious meal during their lunch break can enjoy the special “Business Lunch” at Noodles restaurant which offers the finest selection of Chinese cuisine including exquisite soups and a wide variety of noodle dishes.
 
Source:- Jeddah Hote
